name: GitLook
description: Gemini and GitHub API based platform that provides a detailed report and 20 quiz on your GitHub profile

name: SafeMe
description: One-command backend Linux server security: firewall, SSH hardening, DDoS protection, integrity checks and more.

name: ChiX - C Language Editor
description: Python based C Code Editor that uses GCC to run code in windows terminal

name: GF Model
description: A simple Python client for the GitHub Models API. This package provides an easy-to-use interface to interact with GitHub's free, OpenAI-compatible inference API, allowing you to integrate large language models into your projects with a GitHub Personal Access Token (PAT) instead of a paid API key.
